td.content: s:patient presents with severe difficulty reading, severe poor night vision, severe gradual decrease in visual field in the left eye and Head/Eyes/Ears/Nose/Throat for 3 weeks. pt is a white female principal aged 46 yrs. o:Height 65 in, Weight 200 lbs, Temperature 98.4 F, Pulse 78, SystolicBP 104, DiastolicBP 64, Respiration 14, Multifocal Electroretinography (+) Multifocal deficiencies of maculae on ERG a:Retinitis Pigmentosa p:administered vitamin A - 50000 IU see comments, performed Multifocal Electroretinography, and performed E/M Emergency Services Level 3 - Completed.
